amendment.description: To increase funding for the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3703 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 95 - 0. Record Vote Number: 189.

action.text: Amendment SA 3703 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5713; text: CR S5713) To increase funding for the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline.
